Author: Moderator
Message: Welcome Tam.

Author: Moderator
Message: Thank you for participating in this study.

Author: Tam
Message: No problem, got some time to kill.

Author: Moderator
Message: In the next posts, I'll be going over the rules of the "game" you're about to play.

Author: Moderator
Message: Once I'll be done, I'll ask you if you've understood the rules, and if you haven't I'll explain them in different words.

Author: Moderator
Message: You're about to talk to Andrew. Andrew is a fictive character that has been completely created for the purpose of this study.

Author: Moderator
Message: You'll be talking to him twice.

Author: Moderator
Message: The only difference between the two conversations you'll have with him, is that in one of them Andrew will be played by a real human.

Author: Moderator
Message: In the other, it will be played by an Artificial Intelligence we are developing.

Author: Moderator
Message: We will call the Human and the Artificial Intelligence the Actors.

Author: Moderator
Message: The order in which you'll be talking to each Actor is random.

Author: Moderator
Message: You will not be talking twice with the same Actor.

Author: Moderator
Message: Both the Artificial Intelligence and the Human will try to portray the same Andrew in the most convincing way they can.

Author: Moderator
Message: Your goal is simple. After talking to the two actors, you'll have to guess which one was the Artificial Intelligence and which one was the Human.

Author: Moderator
Message: Whenever you have made your decision, you are able to stop the conversation.

Author: Moderator
Message: Each conversation will last for 15 minutes maximum if you do not decide to stop it before.

Author: Moderator
Message: Please, keep your posts to text only (No smileys, no links... etc)

Author: Moderator
Message: Do not type more than one post per answer.

Author: Moderator
Message: Do you understand the rules and what you have to do?

Author: Tam
Message: I do. Any other kinds of posts that are to be avoided?

Author: Moderator
Message: Not necessarily. But try to keep talking to Andrew, not the actors.

Author: Moderator
Message: Any other questions?

Author: Tam
Message: Don't think so.

Author: Moderator
Message: Good. Andrew will start the conversation. The 15 minutes will start after your answer. Are you ready?

Author: Tam
Message: Yes.

Author: Andrew
Message: Hello!

Author: Tam
Message: Hello, Andrew! How has your day been?

Author: Andrew
Message: It's been quite alright thanks! What about your day?

Author: Tam
Message: It was okay, first week of Uni is always a bit boring. Are you a student too, or what do you do?

Author: Andrew
Message: I study Biology yes. Why is this your first week though? Isn't it halfway through the year already?

Author: Tam
Message: Not where I live. The semester just started this Monday - or rather this Tuesday, since the Monday was a holiday.

Author: Andrew
Message: Oh alright. Where do you live? If you don't mind me asking.

Author: Tam
Message: Germany, that is as specific as I am going to get. You're in France, I guess?

Author: Andrew
Message: No I'm in Canada actually. Ontario to be more accurate.

Author: Tam
Message: Oh, my brother was there as an exchange student a few years back. He went to Quebec, though.

Author: Andrew
Message: Oh nice! I've actually never been to Quebec yet.

Author: Tam
Message: He said it was alright, although rather cold. His fault for going to Canada in the winter I guess.

Author: Andrew
Message: Well to be fair, winter kinda lasts for 6 months here.

Author: Tam
Message: I am still blaming him. He planned it, he froze his ass off.

Author: Andrew
Message: We had a very cold winter 2 years ago. How is the weather in Germany right now?

Author: Tam
Message: Well, I know it snowed in two states, and there was hail here today. Way colder than last week. April's just weird I guess.

Author: Andrew
Message: Oh right. We got a bad storm here about a week ago. Other than that it's actually been decently warm.

Author: Tam
Message: Yeah, we haven't had one of those yet. They usually happen in autumn over here.

Author: Andrew
Message: What are you up to this evening? Or night for you actually.

Author: Tam
Message: Mostly just hanging around, watched a movie earlier, and now I am thinking about just turning in a bit earlier today.

Author: Andrew
Message: What was the movie?

Author: Moderator
Message: Time is up!

Author: Moderator
Message: Which actor do you think you've been talking to (This is not your final answer)

Author: Tam
Message: I think this one was the human.

Author: Moderator
Message: Alright. We'll start the next conversation. Andrew will begin and then you'll have 15 minutes after your answer. Are you ready?

Author: Tam
Message: I am.

Author: Andrew
Message: Hello!

Author: Tam
Message: Hey, Andrew! How are you?

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm doing alright thanks! How about you?

Author: Tam
Message: Doing fine, today was a bit of a slog but I will manage.

Author: Andrew
Message: Oh? What happened?

Author: Tam
Message: Just had to wait over an hour between each seminar because they basically just handed out the participation lists and quickly said what we would do this semester.

Author: Andrew
Message: What do you study? I take it you're s a

Author: Tam
Message: Education, second semester. Do you study something too?

Author: Andrew
Message: I study Biology actually.

Author: Tam
Message: How long have you been studying for?

Author: Andrew
Message: I'm an undergrad student. That's my 3rd year of college.

Author: Tam
Message: Oh, getting close to the bachelor then? Assuming it works the same way where you study.

Author: Andrew
Message: Only one year left. Yes pretty much. Then I'm hoping to start Neurosciences.

Author: Tam
Message: Oh wow, that's a cool topic. I'd thought about going into Neuropsychology, I just hope the subject is called that in English too, but just decided otherwise. Wanted to work with people in the end.

Author: Andrew
Message: What do you want to do later? And yeah I can understand that.

Author: Tam
Message: Just thinking about going to bed early, really. Do you have any plans?

Author: Andrew
Message: Sorry I meant, as a job, what you'll want to do later. There's plenty of different ways to go in education.

Author: Tam
Message: Oh! Counseling and care, most likely, especially for handicapped kids. What do you plan to do?

Author: Andrew
Message: Mostly research on the brain and neurons, and how we're able to learn. And that is pretty cool!

Author: Tam
Message: Yeah, I guess I am going into that from a different direction at the moment. How do we learn, but not about the mechanics, but the methods we use to learn.

Author: Andrew
Message: That definitely sounds great. I wish you the best luck!

Author: Moderator
Message: Time is up!

Author: Tam
Message: Aw damn, just wanted to ask something.

Author: Tam
Message: And yeah, I guess I will stay with my earlier guess.

Author: Moderator
Message: Which actor do you think you've been talking to in the first conversation?

Author: Tam
Message: The human one.

Author: Moderator
Message: On a scale from 1 (not sure at all) to 7 (certain), how confident are you of your answer?

Author: Tam
Message: I'd say a 6.

Author: Moderator
Message: Alright thank you for your participation! If you've given your e-mail, we'll send you some information about the results of this study in the coming months.

Author: Moderator
Message: If you have any comments you'd like to share, feel free to do so now; Otherwise you can now close this window.

Message: Any chance to hear which was which right now?
